title: I took admission in the 2nd round and the classes started from yesterday..
content: Yo, the college vibes are totally off, man. It feels like I'm back in high school or something. I'm not getting that college experience I was hoping for. What should I do?

comments.body:
Welcome to the 3 years of disciplinary life :)

The 4th year will be chill from the college side, if u chose btech
You'll get used to it don't worry

tf does college experience even mean? I joined yesterday too, ofc the first few days are gonna take some getting used to

that's the case with any place you go to
I'm from btech only ,currently in rr cs
change your expectations
bro thinks college in movies = college in real life
To me it's because of our electrical faculty, she acts like a school teacher. Today she took away a guy's phone while he has checking his attendance.

Bruh what exactly do u mean by college experience ? No college is like how Bollywood portrays it to be lmao especially not on the first day. Idk what your expectations were but I'm having a good time here so far. They might be slightly more strict than other colleges but even the so called lenient ones won't fit into your idea of what college is supposed to be.
Lmao kids thinking that PESU (or any college in the country) is going to give them a college life that's portrayed in movies
